subject: RE: New website - Images and addresses

full_threads.body:
Hi Mel, 

Thanks for providing the details. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://www.drpeterloder.com/patient-resources/faqs/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

@rica please change the question copy to:

What is the current consultation fee? 

Then ok to send. Thanks!

@heath done updating the FAQ page, is it okay to reply?
https://www.drpeterloder.com/patient-resources/faqs/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Please add the fees to the FAQs page… maybe after the ‘how soon can I have an appointment’ question.

Also see email change request.

Thanks

Hi Heath,

Confirming Dr Loder’s fees:

Initial consultation $230
Follow up consultation $115

I also note the email contact for Dr Loder is ‘peterloder@bigpond.com <mailto:peterloder@bigpond.com>’ . Can we please update it to ‘admin@drloder.com.au <mailto:admin@drloder.com.au>’.

Thank you!

Kind regards,

Mel


From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 25 March 2021 3:57 PM
To: Peter Loder <peterloder@bigpond.com>
Cc: Admin for Dr Peter Loder Admin@drloder.com.au <mailto:Admin@drloder.com.au>
Subject: Re: New website - Images and addresses

Thanks Peter,

We will fix up the Wahroonga issue and keep an eye out for the current consultation fees.

Speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
<https://wolfiq.com.au/>


On 25 Mar 2021, at 2:44 pm, Peter Loder <peterloder@bigpond.com <mailto:peterloder@bigpond.com>> wrote:

Hi Heath

Just a few minor changes to the website, please.

I note that Wahroonga has been misspelled “Wahroongah” several times.

Could we also post our current consultation fees.

I will ask Mel, my practice manager to forward a list to you.

Regards

Peter Loder


On 7 Jun 2020, at 6:51 pm, Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Peter,

Ok noted, thank you.

Can you please send me the logins to your domain name and we will get the site live. Very exciting!

Let me know if you need a hand tracking down the logins.

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Creative Director - Wolf IQ

P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>

﻿Hi Heath

The site looks great.

I agree we should go live and then look at some additions.

Peter

Hope you are well.

Just checking in to see if you have the time to finalise your website project? I’m super keen to get it live for you.

Thanks and speak soon,

Thanks and speak soon,

Hi Heath

There are a couple of errors. My name is misspelled on the large banner. Trish is no longer my PM. I will try to call you this week.

It is always crazy this time of year.

Peter

Thanks and speak soon,

On 18 Nov 2019, at 6:56 pm, Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Peter,

Hope you are well.

Great, news, we have the site ready for you to review!

We have created a clean, modern and professional looking site for you. The idea is to position you as person of authority, to build trust with the patients and to have a calming affect. Here is a 5min video overview for you: https://www.loom.com/share/c69690c7cc594875b42b0e443984ae8a <https://www.loom.com/share/c69690c7cc594875b42b0e443984ae8a>

And here is a link to the temporary address: https://drpeterloder.wpperk.cloud/ <https://drpeterloder.wpperk.cloud/>

Next steps:

Let us know of any content you would like tweaked or any images that don’t resonate with you.
Let us know about the referrers page (see video)
Provide us with your domain name logins
Then we go live and hook up to the Google My Business accounts once you receive the post cards.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR -WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E.heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P.1300 072 134 | M.0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>


On 12 Nov 2019, at 10:44 am, Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:

Great! Thanks Peter.

We will now be doing 2 key tasks:

1. Creating your website: this will be ready for review by the end of this week.
2. Creating your Google My Business pages for both locations: Within 6 business days you will receive a physical postcard that is mailed to both your two locations. When you receive this, can you please send me the pin number on each of the cards? This is used to verify that you have a premise at the location specified to Google.


Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR-WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E.heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P.1300 072 134 | M.0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>

Hi Heath

Thanks

I have uploaded a photo done professionally (thought it happened when I did the online questionnaire).

Both addresses are correct.

Regards

Peter


On 5 Nov 2019, at 6:05 pm, Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:

Hi Peter,

Hope you are well.

We have been getting the structure of your site ready.

I noted on your onboarding form that you have some images we can use for the website? Can you please upload them here:https://www.dropbox.com/request/bRnorWK1a2p7VdmYnekt <https://www.dropbox.com/request/bRnorWK1a2p7VdmYnekt>

Also, can I confirm that the below two addresses are correct (as copied from your current website)? We will use these to setup your Google My Business pages. Once we create these, Google will mail a unique Postcard to each address. This post card will contain a pin number. Can I ask you to email the pin numbers so I can complete the activation with Google.
Suite 2, 2 Redleaf Avenue WAHROONGA 2076
Suite 5, Lakeview Private Hospital, 17-19 Solent Circuit NORWEST 2153
Thanks and speak soon,
